org.gaming.blackjack.player
Class Player

java.lang.Object
  org.gaming.blackjack.player.Player

public class Player
extends java.lang.Object

This class is the implementation of a blackjack player , to calculate the count of cards sum and print the cards that player is holding. functionality to add a card to players hand

Since:
07/08/2014
Author:
RaghuBoddeti
